[Groovy] Class Study

java.lang.Object
  Study
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
class Study

This class represents a study.

Property Summary
boolean active

This flag tells whether or not the study is in an active state.
java.lang.String collaborator

This string holds a list of collaborators on the study.

static java.lang.Object constraints

This contains any constraints for the domain class.

java.lang.String coordinator

This string holds the coordinating site/center/group if available.

boolean exclusionary

This flags whether or not involvment in this study excludes the subject from involvement in any other study, or sub-study.
java.lang.String fullName

This is the full name of the study.

java.lang.String name

This is the "short" name for the study, often this is an abbreviation
java.lang.String purpose

This is a short phrase to describe the study.

java.lang.String sponsor

This string can hold the study sponsor informaiton if available.

Study subStudyOf

If this is a sub study, this should contain a reference to the main study that this is a sub study of.
 
Constructor Summary
Study()

 
Method Summary
java.lang.String toString()

This is the method that is the default converter of this class to a string.

 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
java.lang.Object#wait(long), java.lang.Object#wait(long, int), java.lang.Object#wait(), java.lang.Object#equals(java.lang.Object), java.lang.Object#toString(), java.lang.Object#hashCode(), java.lang.Object#getClass(), java.lang.Object#notify(), java.lang.Object#notifyAll()
 

Property Detail

active

boolean active
This flag tells whether or not the study is in an active state.

collaborator

java.lang.String collaborator
This string holds a list of collaborators on the study. For example: "National Option Research Group"

constraints

static java.lang.Object constraints
This contains any constraints for the domain class. Non-default constraints for this class are
  • the subStudyOf attribute is optional (nullable)

coordinator

java.lang.String coordinator
This string holds the coordinating site/center/group if available. For example: "National Institute of Child Health and Development"

exclusionary

boolean exclusionary
This flags whether or not involvment in this study excludes the subject from involvement in any other study, or sub-study.

fullName

java.lang.String fullName
This is the full name of the study. It should not contain any abbreviations.

name

java.lang.String name
This is the "short" name for the study, often this is an abbreviation

purpose

java.lang.String purpose
This is a short phrase to describe the study. This is usually the mission statement of the study. For example: "to improve the health and well-being of children and contribute to understanding the role various factors have on health and disease"

sponsor

java.lang.String sponsor
This string can hold the study sponsor informaiton if available. Commonly this is the "National Cancer Institute"

subStudyOf

Study subStudyOf
If this is a sub study, this should contain a reference to the main study that this is a sub study of.

 
Constructor Detail

Study

Study()

 
Method Detail

toString

java.lang.String toString()
This is the method that is the default converter of this class to a string. This toString() method just returns the contents of the 'name' attribute
